articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Chongjin, May 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent birthday spread on Thursday to Yun Sok Chon, a centenarian living in Jongsan-dong in Chongam District of Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province.
					 Born in Milyang City, South Kyongsang Province during the military occupation of the Japanese imperialism over Korea, he worked as an official of a branch of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) formed by President Kim Il Sung for a long time in the post-war period, making positive efforts for the prosperity of homeland.
					
					 He left capitalist Japan before he came to the DPRK led by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He has a balanced diet. He sees newspapers and tends flowerpots everyday.
					
					 He is asking his descendents to work much more for grateful socialist homeland.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction of Stockbreeding Base in Sepho Area
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction of Stockbreeding Base in Sepho Area
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction of a stockbreeding base in Sepho area.
					 Going round the created pasture and buildings, he learned in detail about the construction and encouraged the builders.
					
					 He convened a consultative meeting of officials of the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions on the spot.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the construction of the base and discussed the measures to put spurs to the projected construction and push ahead with the preparations for its operation at the same time.
					
					 Measures were taken for the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions to supply building and other materials in time in line with the construction plan and to ensure the procurement of livestock of superior strains and veterinary and anti-epizootic work.
					
					 Pak called on officials to increase their responsibility and role in the construction of the base, saying it is an important work to translate into reality the noble desire of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un to improve the people's diet.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: DWUK Spokeswoman Supports S. Korean Women in Their Just Struggle
articles.content:
DWUK Spokeswoman Supports S. Korean Women in Their Just Struggle
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The spokeswoman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) Thursday issued a statement in support of the just struggle of the south Korean women.
					 The actions of the bereaved families of the victims of the ferry Sewol sinking accident and other people from all walks of life against the inhuman atrocities of the Park Geun Hye group are mounting high in south Korea as the days go by, the statement said, adding:
					
					 South Korean women, in particular, are turning out in the dynamic anti-"government" actions with grudge and grief over the death of their children due to the recent hideous ferry sinking tragedy. These strong actions are an eruption of the pent-up resentment and curse against the unpopular rule of the Park group and corrupt society of south Korea. 
					
					 Terming the recent disaster an unprecedented massacre committed by the Park group, the statement went on:
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park group has gone so shameless as to refuse to make any proper apology still now but is busy shifting the blame for the accident to inferiors. 
					
					 Park is neither a human being nor a woman. 
					
					 We, women in the DPRK, de-listed Park as a woman long ago and declared before the whole world that she is not entitled to live under the same sky. 
					
					 There is no reason to expect from her or closely follow her attitude now that the true colors of the Park group as man-killers have been brought to light. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the second and third tragedies like the sinking of ferry Sewol will occur and south Korea is bound to turn into a veritable hell as long as Park is allowed to remain boss of Chongwadae. 
					
					 The south Korean women should turn out in a more dynamic struggle to make a clean sweep of the Park group for the sake of their families, future of their children and genuine life and dignity. 
					
					 For the present, they should take the lead in turning the June 4 elections of local self-governing bodies into a tribunal for severely punishing the Park group. 
					
					 All the women in the DPRK once again express deep sympathy with the grief-stricken south Korean women and extend full support and solidarity to them in their just struggle.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of artistes visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues with profound reverence for the peerlessly great men and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the China Disabled Persons' Federation visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Thursday.
					 At the old home of the President in Mangyongdae they looked round with keen interests the historic relics preserved with much care there, being briefed on the undying story associated with the historic home.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the Friendship Tower, the Munsu Recovery Center, etc.

articles.title: Officials of Iranian Embassy Tour Various Places in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Officials of Iranian Embassy Tour Various Places in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Mansour Chavoshi and staff members of the Iranian embassy here visited the Tower of the Juche Idea on the occasion of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Week for marking the 25th anniversary of the meeting of President Kim Il Sung with Leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran Seyed Ali Khamenei.
					 Being briefed on the great monument dedicated to the great exploits the President performed by founding the immortal Juche idea and clearly indicating the way followed by the era of independence, they went round tower and group of sculptures, went up to the observation deck of the tower and enjoyed bird's eye view of Pyongyang.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the ambassador made the following entry in the visitor's book: The Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung is important for carrying out the sacred cause of the Korean people for the prosperity of the country. We hope that the friendly relations between Iran and the DPRK will grow stronger.
					
					 They visited the Meari Shooting Gallery on Thursday.
					
					 They looked round various places in the shooting gallery including the fashionable shooting range, archery ground, video-game facilities and other service facilities conducive to the cultural and emotional life of people.
					
					 The guests played shooting and archery games with officials of the DPRK, deepening friendly feelings.
					
					 They toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Pyongyang Metro.

articles.title: 14th May 21 Architectural Festival Closes
articles.content:
14th May 21 Architectural Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The 14th May 21 Architectural Festival was closed with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Thursday.
					 The participants in the festival exchanged achievements and experience they gained in the work for solving the issues arising in successfully building monumental edifices and developing architectural science and technology of the country. 
					
					 Such pieces for prize contest as "Changes," "White Sail" and "Golden Ball" representing the development of the Juche-oriented architecture drew attention of the participants for reflecting the high level of formative art in the construction of buildings. 
					
					 Highly appreciated at the festival were construction designing programs and multimedia including combined control system for fountain and sprinkling in greenery in the park of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and guide to indoor decoration of multi-function service center and such papers as "On Architectural Formation of Haedanghwa Service Complex, Modern Service Center" and "On Decision on Scope of Tourist Destination in Consideration of Tourists' Needs and Capacity of Tourist Resorts". 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Jun Hyok, director of the State Designing Guidance Bureau who is chairman of the Central Committee of the Architects Union of Korea, officials concerned and officials, architects, technicians, teachers, researchers, creators students in the fields of construction and fine arts.
					
					 The jury of the festival announced the results and the successful units and individuals were awarded commendations and prizes. 
					
					 Sim Yong Hak, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Architects Union of Korea, in his closing address called upon all the officials, architects, technicians, teachers, researchers and creators to build more splendid monumental edifices representing the era of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 He stressed the need to consolidate the achievements made in the scientific researches and positively introduce them to practices and further develop the architectural science and technology of the country through a dynamic drive for breaking through the cutting edge and thus make positive contributions to ushering in a new era of prosperity in the construction.

articles.title: DPRK Players Return Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Return Home
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK players returned home on Thursday after taking part in the 2014 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship in Thailand.
					 They bagged five gold medals and one bronze medal at the championship.
					
					 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, officials concerned, their families and sports persons.

articles.title: Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Popular at World Horticultural Expo
articles.content:
Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Popular at World Horticultural Expo
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The 2014 World Horticultural Expo goes on in Qingdao, Shandong Province, China, starting on April 25.  The theme of the exposition is "Let life approach to nature".
					 According to In Jong Hui, an official of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, the exposition brought together 37 countries, including the DPRK, Netherlands, Denmark, France, Thailand and Malaysia, and 31 provinces and Hong Kong and Macao of China. Its participants are to compete with each other in show of such flowers as iris and chrysanthemum and decoration of houseplants.
					
					 Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia win great popularity at the exposition, and a gold prize of the exposition was awarded to Kimilsungia in the competition of tropical orchids on May 6.
					
					 Many people have visited the Korean wing of the exposition, where Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia, called flowers of the sun, are on display, expressing their deep impressions.
					
					 Among those people were Ken Starkman, career and technical education dean of Long Beach City College, and Philippe Poullaouec-Gonidec, chairholder of UNESCO Chair in Landscape and Environmental Design, who expressed their admiration at the beauties of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia.
					
					 The Korean wing is crowded with thousands of visitors almost every day.

articles.title: Songdowon International Children's Camp Opens
articles.content:
Songdowon International Children's Camp Opens
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- First-term camping began at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, which was remodeled on the eastern coast of Korea as a monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea, an embodiment of the Juche-based idea of architectural beauty.
					 Seen in the square of the camp are the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with broad smile on their faces, who show fatherly love for pupils of the DPRK and various countries of the world in the park of the camp on the seaside with sweet briers in full bloom, taking children to their arms.
					
					 There are campers' buildings, which bear resemblance to a windship on the right side of the statues and buildings housing a room for education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism, a theatre, an international friendship children's hall, etc. on the left side.
					
					 The camp has a playground with roofed terraces, an outdoor stage, indoor gymnasium, indoor swimming pool, outdoor archery ground.
					
					 What catches one's eye is an aquarium with various species of rare sea creatures and an aviary for disseminating the knowledge of animals and plants.
					
					 The camp also boasts of a sea resort installed with a floating diving tower and an outdoor wading pool with big slides.
					
					 It is one of the edifices representing the outlook of the Workers' Party of Korea on the rising generation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Authors Lots of Works for Development of Juche-oriented Literature and Arts
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Authors Lots of Works for Development of Juche-oriented Literature and Arts
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il authored lots of works for the development of literature and arts for several decades, clearly indicating the way for the Juche-oriented literature and arts to follow.
					 Inheriting President Kim Il Sung's idea of the Juche-oriented literature and arts, Kim Jong Il authored "On Establishing the Party's Monolithic Ideological System in the Field of Art and Literature", "On the Effective Embodiment of the Party's Monolithic Ideology in Literary and Artistic Works" and other works, clarifying the revolutionary nature and mission of the Korean literature and arts and indicating tasks and ways for developing them into a powerful weapon for the party ideological work.
					
					 He set forth a policy of bringing about a radical turn in the literature and arts in the course of adapting the immortal classics personally created by the President during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle for various forms of literary and art works and clarified issues arising in its implementation.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that his work "Theory of Cinematic Art" made public on April 11, Juche 62 (1973) is an encyclopedia of literature and arts in the era of independence as it clarified and systemized the theoretical and practical issues arising in building the Juche-oriented literature and arts from a fresh and integral angle.
					
					 He laid down an original policy of making a revolution in opera art in his works such as "On the Art of Opera" and wisely led the drive to create new forms of revolutionary and popular operas.
					
					 He clarified in detail the principles to be consistently held fast to in creating the socialist literature and arts and the ways to do so in his works "Theory of Dancing Art", "Theory of Musical Art" and so on.
					
					 He authored many other works during the period of the Arduous March, the  forced march in the 1990s, making sure that the People's Army created a model of Songun culture and the whole society followed it and thus ushered in a new heyday of literature and arts in the Songun era.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Reckless Remarks Made by Spokesman for S. Korean Defense Ministry
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Reckless Remarks Made by Spokesman for S. Korean Defense Ministry 
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Spokesman for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense Kim Min Sok talked this or that about the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its political system at a news briefing on May 12.
					 He found fault with the just demand raised again by the DPRK to clarify the story behind the "north's involvement" in the drone case and to start a joint investigation just like a guilty party filing the suit first. He went the lengths of calling the DPRK a "country telling a lie" and a "country that should not be allowed to exist".
					
					 This is an intolerable insult to the sovereignty of the DPRK, the most independent, popular and dignified country in the world, and a declaration of an all-out confrontation of the social systems.
					
					 Kim Min Sok's nonsensical talk is a last ditch effort vividly revealing the true nature of the puppet group making a desperate bid to tide over the ever-deepening ruling crises.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is finding itself in the worst crisis due to the unprecedented ferry sinking tragedy and other disasters.
					
					 People of all social standings wage an unflinching action demanding the resignation of the incompetent and irresponsible Park Geun Hye regime. The people's resentment against Chongwadae is running high in south Korea. 
					
					 Thrown into extreme horror and uneasiness, the Park group is working hard to calm down the public anger and get rid of the pretty fix even by pulling up the DPRK just as what her preceding dictators did.
					
					 This is clearly proved by the behavior of Kim Min Sok, a yes man of Park and a trumpeter of the puppet Ministry of Defense.
					
					 At a news briefing on April 22 Kim jabbered that "south Korea is closely following the north's moves for a nuclear test" and "there will happen something alarming before April 30." On April 29 he cried out for "resolutely countering" while talking about a "provocation" by someone.
					
					 The whole of south Korea has turned into a mayhem in the wake of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster. How can the spokesman for the "Ministry of Defense" which oft-repeats its care for the people's lives and security let loose such outbursts?
					
					 The ferry disaster is a hideous man-made one for which the Park Geun Hye regime and the puppet Defense Ministry are wholly to blame.
					
					 The April 12th issue of the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News in an article titled "Quick involvement of maritime police could have saved all passengers aboard" said the maritime police had 47 minutes enough to have access to the ferry and rescue the passengers right before the sinking, adding a person concerned of the prosecution-police joint investigation headquarters for the sinking of ferry Sewol clarified that at 9:30 on April 16 when the maritime police arrived at the scene first, the ferry was tilted about 45 degrees, and if the maritime police had immediately started the rescue operation, all passengers on board could have been rescued.
					
					 If the ministry equipped with huge troops as well as diving outfit essential for rescue operation, to say nothing of rescue aid gears had taken timely measures, such a big disaster would not have occurred.
					
					 But not only Park who has full command of the armed forces but the puppet Defense Ministry were keen to evade the responsibility, far from starting the rescue operation. Moreover, they tried to divert elsewhere the public criticism by pulling up the DPRK.
					
					 It was by no means fortuitous that the Chinese Huan Qiu Shibao on April 23 commented that "the south Korean Defense Ministry at a news briefing on April 22 diverted the attention of the outside world to the areas north of the 38th parallel."
					
					 The DPRK has already clarified that it would settle accounts with those who hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership and the sacred political system in it whoever he or she may be and wherever they might be.
					
					 Kim Min Sok is seriously mistaken if he thinks he can get rid of the precision strike range as he has already been put on the list of targets.
					
					 Those who are engaged only in hideous provocative acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and slandering its political system will be forced to pay a very high price.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Park's Ambition for "Unification of Social Systems" Daydream
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Park's Ambition for "Unification of Social Systems" Daydream
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an article Thursday dismisses Park Geun Hye's "doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" as an armchair argument which can never come true.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The Park group's doctrine is an unpardonable watchword for confrontation as it is aimed to realize its sinister scenario for achieving "the unification of the social systems" backed by foreign forces.
					
					 If the Koreans are to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification, their long-cherished desire, it is necessary not to consider the differing ideologies and social systems as absolute but achieve the reunification by federal formula on the principle of recognizing and tolerating each other's ideology and social system.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities have been indifferent to this reasonable proposal of federal formula and have worked with bloodshot eyes to achieve the "unification of the social systems".
					
					 The above-said doctrine touted by the south Korean puppet group is nothing but a ridiculous charade staged by it in the anticipation of any "contingency" in the DPRK.
					
					 The socialist system in the DPRK is the most solid socialist one centered on the popular masses as the army and people are single-mindedly united.
					
					 Thanks to the Worker' Party of Korea's great politics of love the people lead a dignified and happy life and hurrah for socialism is heard from every part of the country. The DPRK has a very bright prospect and the future of the nation is rosy.
					
					 The social system in south Korea is a fascist colonial dictatorial system under which the independent aspiration of the popular masses is violated at the point of bayonet. It is like dregs of the times as it lived out its days. 
					
					 As shown by the ferry Sewol tragedy, the south Korean society is a hell where the working people cannot live in peace even a moment.
					
					 The Park group's pursuance of the doctrine is as foolish an act as precipitating its self-destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Invectives of Spokesman for S. Korean Ministry of Defense
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Invectives of Spokesman for S. Korean Ministry of Defense
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary denounces the invectives let loose by a spokesman for the south Korean puppet ministry of Defense called Kim Min Sok to escalate confrontation.
					 What Kim uttered is nothing but hysteria kicked off only by those steeped in inveterate hostility toward the DPRK and the idea of confrontation with it to the marrow of their bones and hell-bent on provocations to the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The unprecedented vitriol let loose by this military gangster reminiscent of the scream made by a psychopath is the most blatant challenge to the dignified social system of the DPRK, a thrice-cursed act of pushing the inter-Korean relations to an all-out confrontation and a stunning case which can never be overlooked.
					
					 The case is not only a continuation of the Park Geun Hye group's ceaseless provocations to the DPRK but their height.
					
					 Any accidental case can lead to a war at once under the present situation where the political and military confrontation between the north and the south has reached an extreme phase.
					
					 It is quite clear how the army and people will react to such grave case hurting the social system and dignity which they regard dearer than their own lives. Very serious are the consequences to be entailed by the reckless behavior of the puppet group. It can neither be retracted nor be put under control. Therefore, it is quite natural that the south Korean public is becoming vocal demanding the immediate ouster of Kim and those behind him.
					
					 It is long since the Park group ceased to live as part of the Korean nation. Therefore, there is no need to show any goodwill, magnanimity and patience for it. The DPRK has no reason to closely follow its attitude or hesitate anything. This is the lesson drawn by the DPRK again.
					
					 The Park group will get to know what dear price it will have to pay for its reckless remarks.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Moves to Stamp out Progressive Media
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Moves to Stamp out Progressive Media
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- South Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo Tuesday carried an article denouncing the puppet group for their moves to stamp out progressive media.
					 The authorities are seeking to close the paper for the mere reason that it dealt with the news about the north, the article said.
					
					 There prevails in south Korea heterogeneity little short of banning any talk about the society in the north.
					
					 By origin, the Koreans in the south and the north were separated from each other by outsiders though they are one and the same nation, the article noted, adding that to prevent one from watching the north unconditionally is little short of forcing one to forget one's native place and abandon parents and their children.
					
					 The south Koreans should properly understand the north for the sake of reunification but the "government" remains hostile toward the north, regarding it a country which one should not know about, it stressed.
					
					 The "government" is working hard to stamp out the paper though it has made efforts to let the south Koreans know about the truth about the north, it held.
					
					 It declared that the paper would make more dynamic efforts for the reunification of the country defying the "government's" moves.

articles.title: De-Nationalization Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
De-Nationalization Opposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- More than 1 000 civic and social figures of south Korea Monday held a press conference before Seoul Railway Station at which they issued a declaration opposing the puppet authorities' moves for the de-nationalization, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					 The declaration said:
					
					 Through the ferry Sewol sinking disaster, the society is clearly watching what disaster was caused by the bankruptcy of the public sectors which gave priority to pursuing unlimited profits.
					
					 But the "government" is still seeking the de-nationalization under the pretext of "competition".
					
					 The "government" which allows the de-nationalization aimed at moneymaking to decide the future and safety of the people can no longer be called as such.
					
					 If it is left unchecked, the disaster in the sea may lead to more horrible accidents in the railway field, hospitals and schools anytime.
					
					 The declaration warned that the people would judge the "government" which does not stop the de-nationalization despite the lesson taught by the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					
					 They would further escalate the struggle against the de-nationalization through one million signature-campaign, etc., it stressed.

articles.title: Residents' Vital Rights Threatened by Ferry Sinking Disaster in S. Korea
articles.content:
Residents' Vital Rights Threatened by Ferry Sinking Disaster in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The right to existence of the residents living near the scene of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster is put at serious peril, according to south Korean MBC on Monday.
					 The full-grown seaweed is rotting as surrounding waters and culture farms are contaminated by more than 200 tons of oil that leaked from the ferry.
					
					 Fishermen have lost their way of living.
					
					 Residents' curses and resentment are running high against the puppet authorities who have not taken any measure though more than 20 days have passed since the area was declared as a special disaster-torn area.

articles.title: Measures against Collapse of Interior of Ferry Sewol Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Measures against Collapse of Interior of Ferry Sewol Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The bereaved families of victims of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster urged the puppet authorities to cope with the collapse of the interior of the ferry on May 11, according to south Korean KBS.
					 They asserted that the collapse of the interior of the sunken ferry has caused difficulties in the finding of those missing. 
					
					 They urged the authorities to take prompt measures for finding those who are reported still missing under the sea.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Deals with Expansion of Students' Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Deals with Expansion of Students' Struggle
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, south Korean internet newspaper, in an editorial on May 13 dealt with the struggle of students demanding the puppet government make an apology and take responsibility for the ferry Sewol tragedy.
					 It referred to the candlelight rallies and demonstration marches going on in different parts of south Korea including Seoul, Kwangju and Ansan and Uijongbu of Kyonggi Province to honor the memory of the victims to the disaster.
					
					 It noted:
					
					 A memorial rally held in Ansan on May 9 was attended by students of all the 24 high schools in the city.
					
					 The participants prayed for the souls of the victims in tears and denounced the "government" for not rescuing children even though it was possible to rescue them before the sinking. They also censured the media for spreading a report distorting the truth and demanded Park Geun Hye make sincere apology and take responsibility.
					
					 Youngsters who took to the streets said their colleagues were buried at the sea as they remained where they were just as they were told to "stay put" from broadcast. They stressed they would never do as was told to do by the authorities again.
					
					 Silence demonstration on the theme of "stay put" is increasingly joined by school youth and children, a clear indication of their minds.   Consistent are the shouts of the school youth and children made to the world.
					
					 The ruling quarters should answer the school youth and children in actions that "We feel responsibility and we will try to prevent such grievous deaths from happening again". But they did not hesitate to utter such rubbish that school youth and children "participated in action for 60 000 won per day", "They were instigated by an organization following the north" and "Those who take part in the candlelight rally will be punished".
					
					 School youth and children look more like grown-up persons as the ruling quarters are engrossed in evading responsibility and making lies.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Denounce Monstrous Crimes of U.S.
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Denounce Monstrous Crimes of U.S.
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public on May 5 a statement in denunciation of the monstrous crimes committed by the U.S. against the Koreans.
					 The history of the U.S. invasion of Korea began in the 19th century, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists occupied south Korea under the mask of "liberator" in September of 1945, bringing unspeakable pain resulting from division to the Korean nation.
					
					 They openly revealed their ambition for invading the whole of Korea and finally instigated the south Korean puppet forces to launch armed invasion of the DPRK on June 25, 1950. 
					
					 During the Korean war the U.S. imperialists killed innocent Koreans by the most cruel and brutal manner and barbarously bombed many cities of Korea, reducing them to ashes. 
					
					 The atrocities they have committed against the Korean nation in the past are unprecedented in history in their brutal and cruel nature.
					
					 These facts help world people know well why the Koreans angrily brand the U.S. as their sworn enemy. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors are staging ceaseless nuclear war exercises against the DPRK and obstructing the reunification of Korea in every way still now. 
					
					 Those crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean nation should be brought to the international court and they deserve a severe punishment.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A Czech committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony in Prague on May 7.
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events from June 1 to July 10 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Premier coreano estimula a constructores de base ganadera de Sepho
articles.content:
Premier coreano estimula a constructores de base ganadera de Sepho
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno como marcha la construccion de la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho.
					Recorriendo los herbazales artificiales y las edificaciones, Pak estudio en detalles el estado de ejecucion y estimulo a los constructores movilizados en la obra.
					
					Se abrio en el terreno la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					En la ocasion, se hizo balance del estado de construccion y se discutieron los remedios para dar acicate a la construccion de edificios previstos y para impulsar simultaneamente los preparativos de operacion.
					
					Ademas fueron asignadas las tareas al Consejo de Ministros, los ministerios y los organos centrales para que suministren a tiempo los equipos y materiales de construccion acorde al plan de ejecucion y tomen de antemano las medidas para la obtencion de buenas razas de ganados y la prevencion veterinaria. 
					
					Pak llamo a los funcionarios a elevar la responsabilidad y el papel en la construccion destacando que la construccion de base ganadera es una obra importante para hacer realidad el noble deseo de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de mejorar la vida alimentaria del pueblo.

articles.title: UMDC manifiesta apoyo y solidaridad con lucha de mujeres surcoreanas
articles.content:
UMDC manifiesta apoyo y solidaridad con lucha de mujeres surcoreanas 
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- La portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC) hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion de apoyo a la justa lucha de las mujeres surcoreanas.
					La nota se refiere a que en el suelo surcoreano se dinamiza cada dia mas la lucha de los habitantes de distintos estratos y los familiares de victimas del incidente de hundimiento del barco de pasajeros, indignados por el proceder inhumano de la banda de Park Geun-hye sobre el desastre. 
					
					Las mujeres surcoreanas se levantan en la lucha antigubernamental expresando su colera y tristeza por haber perdido a sus hijos queridos, apunta la nota y prosigue: 
					
					Esta lucha es la explosion de rencor acumulado por las politicas antipopulares de la banda de Park y por la corrupta sociedad surcoreana. 
					
					La tragedia del barco "Sewol" es la masacre cometida por la banda de Park. 
					
					Sin embargo, esta horda se apresura a imputar la responsabilidad a sus inferiores sin pedir debidamente las disculpas. 
					
					Park Geun-hye no es un ser humano ni mucho menos una mujer. 
					
					Las mujeres coreanas tacharon ya a ella de la lista de poblacion femenina y declararon a todo el mundo que ella no puede convivir. 
					
					Dado que se ha revelado la naturaleza asesina de la banda de Park, no tenemos nada que esperar ni observar.
					
					Mientras que Park se mantenga en el poder de Chongwadae, ocurrira el segundo y tercer caso de hundimiento del barco "Sewol" y el suelo surcoreano se convertira en el infierno. 
					
					Las mujeres surcoreanas deben librar con mas dinamismo la lucha por aniquilar a la horda de Park, asesina sin par, para el futuro de sus familiares e hijos y por la autentica vida y dignidad. 
					
					Por inmediato, deben tomar la delantera en sentenciar a los compinches de Park en las elecciones de autonomia local que tendran lugar el 4 de junio que viene. 
					
					Todas las mujeres de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea manifiestan una vez mas profundas condolencias a las mujeres surcoreanas entristecidas y envian el apoyo total y solidaridad con su justa lucha.

articles.title: Clausurado XIV Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo
articles.content:
Clausurado XIV Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el XIV Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo.
					Los participantes en el festival intercambiaron los exitos y experiencias logrados en el curso de solucionar los problemas que surgen en levantar magnificamente las edificaciones monumentales y desarrollar la ciencia y tecnica arquitectonicas del pais.
					
					Las obras presentadas en concurso, tituladas "Cambio", "Vela blanca", "Balon de oro", etc. que reflejan el aspecto de desarrollo de la arquitectura del Juche, atrajeron la atencion de los participantes por su alto nivel estetico y artistico.
					
					Obtuvieron alta apreciacion los programas de diseno de construccion, multimedias y varias tesis como "Sobre la formacion arquitectonica del Complejo de Servicios Haedanghwa", "La dimension de la zona turistica fijada tomando en consideracion la demanda de turistas y la capacidad de la zona turistica", etc.
					
					La ceremonia de clausura tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la Casa Central de la Juventud,
					
					Estuvieron presentes el titular de la Direccion Estatal de Diseno, Ri Jun Hyok, quien es presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Arquitectos de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas interesadas y las otras de construccion y bellas artes, arquitectos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores, creadores y estudiantes universitarios.
					
					Se dio a la publicidad el resultado de jurado y hubo la premiacion a las entidades e individuos que han sido evaluados bien.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra de clausura, el vicepresidente del CC de la UAC, Sim Yong Hak, exhorto a todos los funcionarios, arquitectos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores y creadores que levanten mucho mas y con excelencia las creaciones monumentales que representen la epoca del Partido del Trabajo.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de aplicar en la practica los exitos de investigacion cientifica, desarrollar mas las ciencias y tecnicas arquitectonicas del pais al dinamizar la campana para conquistar la tecnologia de punta y contribuir asi a la apertura de nueva era dorada en la construccion.
